head.title: Java Document Editing API | Edit PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint
head.description: Java document editing API to load, edit and save document pages from PDF, Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, eBook and email formats.

header.description: Powerful editor API to manipulate Microsoft Office, PDF, HTML, eBook and email files.

actions.title: Ready to get started?
actions.description: Try GroupDocs.Editor features for free or request a license.

overview.description: API to edit, convert, and save documents, spreadsheets, slides, and e-books in Java applications.

feature_1.title: Effortlessly edit multiple documents in Java
feature_1.description1: Seamlessly edit multiple PDF and Office files with support for a wide range of formats.
feature_1.description2: makes document editing fast and hassle-free.

feature_2.title: Convert documents to HTML/CSS
feature_2.description: Convert documents to pure HTML/CSS markup compatible with WYSIWYG editors, allowing easy and efficient document editing in a web environment.

feature_3.title: Save edited documents in various formats
feature_3.description: Save your edited documents back to their original format or export them to other formats such as PDF, ensuring flexibility and compatibility.

formats.title: Supported file formats
formats.description: GroupDocs.Editor supports operations with the following file formats on import and export

features.description: Seamlessly load, edit and save in different formats Office documents, Emails, eBooks, and PDF.

feature_1.title: Edit files
feature_1.content: Edit the content of various document formats including PDF, DOCX, XLSX, PPTX, and more.

feature_2.title: Translate to HTML/CSS
feature_2.content: Convert documents to HTML/CSS for easy editing with WYSIWYG editors like CKEditor or TinyMCE.

feature_3.title: Save edited documents
feature_3.content: Save the edited HTML/CSS back to the original document format or export to PDF.

feature_4.title: Extract document information
feature_4.content: Extract information such as page count, size, and encryption status from documents.

feature_5.title: Support for various formats
feature_5.content: Edit a wide range of document formats including Microsoft Office files, PDFs, and more.

feature_6.title: Password protection
feature_6.content: Load and edit password-protected documents with ease, and protecting the output documents with password protection.

feature_7.title: Edit email
feature_7.content: Edit and save the email messages and letters in MSG, EML, EMLX, MBOX and many other formats, including editing metadata like Subject, To, CC, BCC, From, Title, Date and so on.

feature_8.title: Font extraction
feature_8.content: Extract fonts from WordProcessing documents for use in the editing process.

feature_9.title: Preview pages
feature_9.content: Generate image representations of document pages to better understand content and structure.

code_samples.title: Code samples
code_samples.description: Some use cases of typical operations using

sample_1.title: Replace text in DOCX
sample_1.description: This example shows loading and editing a content of the input DOCX file programmatically by replacing text content on another. After that the modified document content is saved back as a new DOCX document.
sample_1.code_title: Edit input DOCX by replacing text and save it back to DOCX
sample_1.comment_1: Load input document by path and specify load options if necessary
sample_1.comment_2: Open document for edit and obtain the "EditableDocument"
sample_1.comment_3: Replace text - this emulates the content editing
sample_1.comment_4: Create new "EditableDocument" instance from edited content
sample_1.comment_5: Prepare save options with desired output formatX
sample_1.comment_6: Save edited document content to DOCX

sample_4.title: Edit content of particular Excel worksheet
sample_4.description: The Spreadsheet document (like XLS, XLSX, XLSM, ODS and so on) may have one or more worksheets (tabs). GroupDocs.Editor allows to edit content of one worksheet at a time. After being edited, this worksheet may be saved to the separate Spreadsheet document (where only this specific worksheet will be saved), or the edited worksheet can be inserted back to the original document, where it can either replace the original worksheet or be saved together, along with original one. This example shows loading XLSX document, editing its 2nd worksheet and saving it as a new separate document in XLSX and CSV formats.
sample_4.code_title: Edit particular worksheet of XLSX and save as XLSX and CSV
sample_4.comment_1: Load input XLSX by path and specify load options if necessary
sample_4.comment_2: Create and adjust the edit options - set 2nd worksheet to edit
sample_4.comment_3: Open this 2nd worksheet for edit and obtain the "EditableDocument"
sample_4.comment_4: Replace text - this emulates the content editing
sample_4.comment_5: Create new "EditableDocument" instance from edited worksheet
sample_4.comment_6: Save edited worksheet to new XLSX document
sample_4.comment_7: Save edited worksheet to new CSV document with comma (,) delimiter/separator

platforms.description: GroupDocs.Editor for Java supports the following operating systems, frameworks, and package managers.
